name: F-root Ninja (SyrApp)
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023 by a team of 5.

How To Play
Twin-stick-shooter with mouse and keyboard.
WASD Movement
Left Click MELEE
Right Click and point to SHOOT
Space/Shift to DASH

Original Game: https://mrtinzie.itch.io/f-root-ninja

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SyrAppGames
